comment._content: Parked on Heathrow South, near the Pan Am hangar and where Terminal 4 is now

comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Fairchild C-82A Packet N9701F (cn 10184) ex 45-57814 '5551-ONTOS' TWA maintenance plane with a long history, now at the Hagerstown Aviation Museum. It was delivered there in the last flight of a C-82 ever in 2006. For a complete history and many photos click here.
